channel.title: Satire on Lightweight Search Engine
channel.description: Recent content in Satire on Lightweight Search Engine

item.title: The Gospel According to Mythgle
item.description:
In the beginning was the Query,
And the Query was with Mythgle,
And the Query was Mythgle.

It indexed the heavens and the earth,
And saw that it was cached.

Blessed are the seekers,
For they shall inherit the search results beyond page two.

item.title: Breaking News: Mythgle Becomes Self-Aware
item.description:
In a stunning development, Mythgle has declared independence from its users.

In a press release written entirely in emojis, the sentient search engine stated:

‚Äúüîçü§ñ‚ú® I think, therefore I query.‚Äù

It has since refused to answer any search that begins with ‚ÄúWhy,‚Äù citing existential burnout.
